snippet: After a rocky start this year, investors saw new gains, including a surge in auto sales.
abstract: Spike in oil prices pushes markets sharply higher for second day in a row, erasing much of their early-2015 losses.
lead_paragraph: After a rocky start this year, investors saw new gains, including a surge in auto sales.

headline.main: Shares Rise, Buoyed by Higher Oil Prices
headline.print_headline: Shares Rise, Buoyed by Higher Oil Prices
